game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Defeat the fearsome dragon in his lair
game.description: You have been tasked with navigating through the treacherous mountain path teeming with hostile creatures, into the dragon's lair to slay him and end his tyranny.
game.reward: The legendary Dragon Slayer's sword and 5000 gold coins

task.description: Travel to the Dragon's mountain while surviving attacks from predatory animals
